ItemManager - Class in Unnamed Package
Manages a collection of items using a Doubly Linked List for sequential access and iteration, a Binary Search Tree for fast lookups by ID, a Priority Queue for viewing items by priority, and a Stack for undoing deletions.
ItemManager() - Constructor for class ItemManager
Constructs a new ItemManager, initializing the data structures.
